article_text:
RIO DE JANEIRO—Brazil’s state-run oil firm Petroleo Brasileiro SA said Thursday that it appointed Luciano Coutinho, head of the country’s development bank, as its new chairman.

Mr. Coutinho replaces Guido Mantega, Brazil’s former finance minister, and is likely to only serve as interim chairman until the company’s next shareholders meeting,...
